messages.title: Focusing on substance rather than smears
messages.content: James Berry is running a positive campaign to be Kingston & Surbiton's next MP.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: The long term economic plan is working
keyPolicies.policyDescription: 2 million jobs created since 2010 - with plans for 2 million more. Fastest growing economy in the Western World. 2.2 million new apprenticeships.
Conservatives pledge to protect per pupil funding. £4.5 million announced for school places in Kingston. James will push for new schools in Kingston.
£8bn pledged over and above inflation. NHS England's full financial needs met by Conservative's plan. 7 day a week access to GPs.

Conservatives pledge to freeze rail fares for 5 years. James supports re-zoning of Kingston & Surbiton. Campaigning for Crossrail 2 to stop at stations in Kingston. James is also discussing bike improvements, including Tolworth Greenway.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The outcome of the election is too close to call - but your vote could be the difference. Kingston & Surbiton is just one of 23 seats that the Conservatives need to win to form a majority government and keep Ed Miliband out of Downing Street.

issues.economy: 2 million jobs created since 2010 - with plans for 2 million more. Fastest growing economy in the Western World. 2.2 million new apprenticeships.
issues.education: Conservatives pledge to protect per pupil funding. £4.5 million announced for school places in Kingston. James will push for new schools in Kingston.
issues.health: £8bn pledged over and above inflation. NHS England's full financial needs met by Conservative's plan. 7 day a week access to GPs.
